name: Digital Culture and Data Analytics Minor
descriptions: The DCDA minor complements any major with skills in statistics, coding, multimedia authoring, and digital analysis. At 21 hours, it provides a focused introduction to digital culture and data analytics.

courses: Multimedia Authoring: WRIT 40163, WRIT 40263, WRIT 40363, WRIT 40463, WRIT 40563, CRWT 30363, STCO 36403, or EDUC 50263

electiveCourses.description: Three general elective courses from the approved elective list
